remarks: A group has a left and right identity element, and every member has a left and right inverse.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpfo.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpoidinv $p |- ( G e. GrpOp -> E. u e. X A. x e. X ( ( ( u G x ) = x /\ ( x G u ) = x ) /\ E. y e. X ( ( y G x ) = u /\ ( x G y ) = u ) ) ) $.
$d G u x y $.
$d X u x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
